context.text: Huddersfield Town F.C. - The Fans' Favourites - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Huddersfield Town FC v d e
( Players in bold italics are currently playing for Town. Players in italics are currently playing elsewhere . )
Huddersfield Town F.C. - The Fans' Favourites
The book lists the 100 Huddersfield Town players voted by the fans as their favourite players. The players are in alphabetical order, as it was thought to be unfair to rank them.
The Fans' Favourites is a book by Alisdair Straughan published, late 2006 , to commemorate the centenary of Huddersfield Town in 2008 .
Huddersfield Town F.C. - The Fans' Favourites
